rooms.description: Spacious foyer with integrated coat closets and a minimalistic reception desk. Adheres to Vastu principles by having a clean, clutter-free entry space.
Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows to capture natural light. Designed for entertaining guests and family gatherings. Vastu compliant positioning ensures energy flow.
Modern dining space with ample seating arrangements. The placement aligns with auspicious directions per Vastu guidelines.
Luxurious master suite featuring a private balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows. Carefully oriented as per Vastu for enhanced privacy and harmony.
Comfortable guest bedroom designed with ample natural light and ventilation. The room is arranged in accordance with Vastu principles for guest comfort.
Additional bedroom integrated within the ground floor plan. Maintains a balance of privacy and accessibility in line with residential Vastu guidelines.
State-of-the-art kitchen equipped with modern appliances and an island counter. The layout is designed for efficient workflow and incorporates Vastu recommendations.

Dedicated library space that doubles as a study area. Features built-in shelving and comfortable seating zones for relaxation and productivity. The position is chosen to enhance creativity per Vastu insights.
Essential service room including laundry and storage. Placed in an inconspicuous location as advised by local building norms.

openings.description: Grand entrance door with a sliding glass panel. The design ensures ease of access and integrates seamlessly with the overall aesthetic.
Floor-to-ceiling window offering panoramic views of the surroundings, enhancing natural light and ventilation while following Vastu recommendations.
Additional windows on either side for balanced lighting and to maintain aesthetic symmetry as per design norms.
